en.welcome:
Welcome to the HPA Maldives COVID-19 bot.

Here you can find quick links to services & information regarding the COVID-19 situation in Maldives.



What would you like to know about?
Choose a number

options.7. Call 1676:
COVID-19 Call Center
Operates 24hrs
Call 1676	
EOC Legal	

For approval and other legal matters
eoclegal@health.gov.mv

To book your vaccine appointment 	
book.hpa.gov.mv	

To check your COVID-19 status & digital vaccine details	
https://covidsafe.gov.mv	

Haalubelun 	
https://haalubelun.hpa.gov.mv/	

MyHealth	
https://my.health.mv/

Saturday to Thursday, 12:00 - 00:00

Locals and migrants needing food

ct@health.gov.mv
